alert.note: Alert for Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 29 at 5:29PM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 528 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN BLACKFORD GRANT JAY WELLS IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN HILLSDALE IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, BERNE, BLUFFTON, BLUFFTON, BRYAN, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, DECATUR, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, DUNKIRK, EDGERTON, FORT WAYNE, GAS CITY, HARTFORD CITY, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, JONESVILLE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MARION, MONTPELIER, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NEW HAVEN, OHIO CITY, OSSIAN, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAYNE, PORTLAND, SHERWOOD, SPENCERVILLE, SWANTON, UPLAND, VAN WERT, AND WAUSEON.
